content:
We have scheduled this session at 1:30 PM Eastern (17:30 UTC) today. Here is the additional description:

In this session we will introduce the notion of a Digital Documentation of Covid Certificates (DDCC) for Vaccination Status (VS). We will review the two use cases, describe the main FHIR data models, the connection to IPS, and overview workflows associated with submitting an immunization event to a Certificate Generation Service to produce a DDCC:VS and associated QR-code(s).

I'll check with the staff and make sure this gets into Whova.
